data.utilizationMethod: Grip one narrow end of the ruler with thumb on one flat face and fingers on the other, then perform stabbing pokes or gentle scoops with the opposite straight edge
Close the blades, place thumb on one closed blade side, index finger along the spine, and move the scissor tips in gentle slicing motions

data.proxyObjectName: folded black phone or tablet stand
data.utilizationMethod: Grip the narrow folded edge between thumb and fingers, point the longer flat surface forward, dip it, then lift while rotating wrist to horizontal

data.proxyObjectName: green turtle-shell plush cushion with white rim
data.utilizationMethod: Place the cushion flat; swirl the ruler tip over the stitched top panels in overlapping circles
Press the ruler tip vertically into the centre of a seat cushion, allowing it to sink several centimetres into the soft foam before the denser base resists

data.proxyObjectName: green round retractable measuring tape with peach-colored tape
data.utilizationMethod: Enclose the circular housing in a full grip, turn it upside-down, and give two short downward snaps
